name: Android Wipe-Out
overview: Android Wipe-Out is a 1-player arcade game for the Apple II. The player controls a small spaceship on the bottom of the screen which can move horizontally, while firing vertically. Above the player is a large maze with 2 exits. Androids run about the maze, and if they reach the 2 exits, they will run along the bottom of the screen and destroy the player's ship. If the player shoots all the androids on the screen, they will advance to a more difficult level with more faster moving androids. The player starts with 3 lives, and if all are lost its game over.
